hero.headline: Your Strategic Partner in Korea & Beyond
hero.subheadline: Connecting Global Trade with Velocity, Trust, and Expertise
hero.description: As members of WCA, MPL, and EAN networks, GOODMAN GLS delivers time-critical logistics solutions with unmatched reliability across air, ocean, and project cargo.

air.name: Air Freight
air.description: Express and time-critical air cargo solutions with GSA/CSA expertise for major carriers.

ocean.name: Ocean Freight
ocean.description: Full container load (FCL) and less than container load (LCL) services worldwide.

project.name: Project Cargo
project.description: Specialized handling for oversized, heavy, and high-value project shipments.

gsa.title: GSA/CSA Expertise
gsa.subtitle: Your Gateway to the Korean Market
gsa.description: As General Sales Agent and Cargo Sales Agent for multiple airlines, we provide unparalleled access to capacity and competitive rates on key routes connecting Korea to the world.
